name: eKidFolio
tag_list: parenting, archive, social-network, digital-portfolio, photo-sharing, document-sharing, cloud-storage, e-commerce
overview:
eKidfolio is a website created for the purpose of documenting, sharing, and archiving the lives of our children through the use of a closed social network to create a digital life portfolio.

eKidfolio.com is a suite of web-based software applications that support the archival, categorization, sorting, retrieval, and social sharing of our children’s life portfolio. The suite will support the needs of families by offering: the ability to upload and store (in the cloud) all digital media and all analog artifacts converted to digital media through the process of scanning and digital photography/videography,
categorization and customization of categories and profiles for diverse needs and capabilities of parents and guardians to tag, label and comment on all artifacts the ability to create a completely customizable social network (called “the family tree”) for the purposes of: sharing artifacts to deliberately selected members in your social network the integration of existing powerful social networks including facebook, and twitter ultimately, the integration of a smartphone app (droid and iphone) to allow for the immediate uploading of archivable material.

Sharing By using the family tree function of eKidfolio you can create and customize your own personal social network for the purpose of sharing the triumphs of your children with family and loved ones of your choosing. Specific permissions are customized for each member of your family tree (closed social network). Aunt Helen might be able to just view, while Grandma might be able to view, post and tag. You choose!

In addition to social sharing and archiving life events, eKidfolio creates a secure place to store important documents such as: birth records medical and immunization records school report cards enrollment information parent teacher communications special education records

In the event of a disaster in the home, your priceless memories are protected. eKidfolio uses cutting edge technology for the purpose of fast, and easy uploading of multiple documents.
